_sText:
*Version 1*
-Remake of my second ever ZE map
-3 seperate paths to escape 
-1 secret

*Version 2*
-Fixed Bugs, text errors

*Version 3*
-Improved FPS
-2 secrets

*Version 4*
-Increased fog's starting distance by 50
-Added 2 sets of blocking boxes to even out zombie infection
-Fixed unintentional shortcut path along lava
-Increased lava hold on zombies to prevent them from gaining the lead
-Increased rock platforms height
-Added another block in center path
